Plot: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.
Title: Wayne's World
Writer: Mike Myers (characters), Mike Myers, Bonnie Turner, Terry Turner
Actors: Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Rob Lowe, Tia Carrere
tomatoConsensus: An oddball comedy that revels in its silliness and memorable catch phrases, Wayne's World is also fondly regarded because of its endearing characters.
